SvcCatalogFilterCriteria.name: SvcCatalogFilterCriteria
SvcCatalogFilterCriteria.description: Represents an eligibility rule that determines if a Service Catalog user has access to a catalog item.

Description.description: A description that states the restriction placed on a user’s access to a catalog items eligibility.

DeveloperName.description: The unique name of the object in the API. The name: must be 40 characters or fewer must begin with a letter can contain only underscores and alphanumeric characters can’t include spaces can’t end with an underscore can’t contain 2 consecutive underscores In managed packages, this field prevents naming conflicts on package installations. With this field, a developer can change the object’s name in a managed package and the changes are reflected in a subscriber’s organization.

IsActive.description: Specifies if the eligibility rule is active.

ManageableState.description: Describes the manageable state of a catalog item that is contained in a package.

MasterLabel.description: The label of the eligibility rule record.

Metadata.description: The metadata type associated with the SvcCatalogFilterCriteria object.

NumOfRelatedItems.description: The number of catalog items that has the eligibility rule.
